This module implements union-find trees.

Types

UnionFind = object
Union-find tree. 
UnionFindNode = int
Union-find node.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Merges the subtree containing node1 with the subtree containing node2. Merging strategy is union-by-size.

Returns the root of the tree containing the node. Path compression is also performed.
